etomica.normalmode

Class MeterHarmonicSingleEnergy

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.normalmode.MeterHarmonicSingleEnergy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterHarmonicSingleEnergy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource
    Meter that calculates the Boltzmann-factored harmonic energy of each normal mode for a configuration given eigenvectors and omegas corresponding to wave vectors.
